messages.title: ON YOUR SIDE IN BATTLE
messages.content: Chris Maskell for Battle Ward - 'I will continue to work hard for the Battle ward community to ensure it is a great place to live.'

issues.environment: Chris Maskell has been central to Environment policy at RBC. He is the current chair of the Council’s Planning Committee and is also in discussions with Thames Valley Police to ensure policing on the Oxford Road remains a top priority.

housing.content: Always speaking up for people in the ward, Chris worked hard to win £1.6 million funding that will benefit the community around Oxford Road, with refurbishments to Beresford Road Park, an upgrade to Kensington Park and more projects planned.

leaflet.personalStatement: Victoria Groulef is not a typical politician. She’s never worked for an MP or been a Minister's adviser. She's an ordinary mum; to Benedict (9) and Mariella (7). She lives in Coley, and has had a life working for charities, as a journalist and running small businesses. Victoria’s got plenty of experience of that. She will be an MP who’ll roll up her sleeves and get on with things, just like you do every single day.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked hard to win £1.6 million funding for the community around Oxford Road, with refurbishments to Beresford Road Park, an upgrade to Kensington Park and more projects planned.
